Project.Brief history of your project and organi: PaiTiTi provides one-stop services for querying, downloading, and accessing nearly 100,000 public datasets via APIs, covering 360+ industries with tools for data exploration and application. Supports online algorithm/model training with code management, execution environments, and flexible computing power to enhance efficiency and reduce costs. Provides full-process AI data management, handling multimodal data (text, images, audio, 3D) with visualization, indicator extraction/correction, API access, and training to streamline AI workflows.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: 100,000 public datasets spanning 360+ industries, including text, images, audio, video, and 3D data, optimized for AI training.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We regularly back up the data used for AI training from our servers to another set of storage devices. On the storage servers, we package the data to generate CAR files and their corresponding CIDs for storage providers (SPs) to download. After the SPs complete data sealing, they provide the mapping between the file list and sector IDs. Using these mappings, we can request query and retrieval services from the SPs. Simultaneously, the community can access and view this public data, ensuring its transparency and availability.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, Europe, Australia (continent)
